SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]から見[み]た僕[ぼく]はきっと ただの友達[ともだち]の友達[ともだち]
SongLyrics.EngStr: From your perspective, I'm probably just a friend's friend.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: たかが知人[ちじん]Bにむけられた 笑顔[えがお]があれならもう 恐[おそ]ろしい人[ひと]だ
SongLyrics.EngStr: If that's the smile you show to just an acquaintance B, you're a frightening person.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]を惚[ほ]れさせる 黒魔術[くろまじゅつ]は知[し]らないし 海[うみ]に誘[さそ]う勇気[ゆうき]も車[くるま]もない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I don't know any black magic to make you fall for me, nor do I have the courage or a car to invite you to the beach.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: でも見[み]たいとなりで目覚[めざ]めて おはようと笑[わら]う君[きみ]を
SongLyrics.EngStr: But I want to see you wake up next to me and smile as you say 'good morning.'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 会[あ]いたいんだ 今[いま]すぐその角[かど]から 飛[と]び出[だ]してきてくれないか
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to see you. Could you come running from around the corner right now?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 夏[なつ]の魔物[まもの]に連[つ]れ去[さ]られ 僕[ぼく]のもとへ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Be taken away by the summer spirits and come to me.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 生[う]まれた星[ほし]のもとが 違[ちが]くたって 偶然[ぐうぜん]と夏[なつ]の魔法[まほう]とやらの力[ちから]で 僕[ぼく]のものに
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if we were born under different stars, by coincidence or summer magic, you'll be mine.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: なるわけないか
SongLyrics.EngStr: Or maybe that will never happen.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]の恋人[こいびと]になる人[ひと]は モデルみたいな人[ひと]なんだろう
SongLyrics.EngStr: The person who becomes your lover will probably look like a model.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そいつはきっと 君[きみ]よりも年上[としうえ]で 焼[や]けた肌[はだ]がよく似合[にあ]う 洋楽好[ようがくず]きな人[ひと]だ
SongLyrics.EngStr: He's definitely older than you, with tanned skin that suits him, and someone who loves Western music.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: キスをするときも 君[きみ]は背伸[せの]びしている
SongLyrics.EngStr: When you kiss him, you'll stand on your tiptoes.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 頭[あたま]をなでられ君[きみ]が笑[わら]います
SongLyrics.EngStr: He'll pat your head, and you'll smile.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 駄目[だめ]だ何[なに]ひとつ勝[か]ってない
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's no use, I don't stand a chance at anything.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いや待[ま]てよ そいつ誰[だれ]だ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Wait, who even is that guy?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 会[あ]いたいんだ 今[いま]すぐその角[かど]から 飛[と]び出[だ]してきてくれないか
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to see you. Could you come running from around the corner right now?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 夏[なつ]の魔物[まもの]に連[つ]れ去[さ]られ 僕[ぼく]のもとへ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Be taken away by the summer spirits and come to me.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]が他[ほか]の誰[だれ]を 気[き]になっていたって 偶然[ぐうぜん]とアブラカタブラな力[ちから]で 僕[ぼく]のものに
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if you're interested in someone else, by coincidence or magic like 'Abracadabra,' you'll be mine.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: この胸[むね]の焦[あせ]りに身[み]を任[まか]せ 君[きみ]のとこへ走[はし]ったとして 実[じつ]は僕[ぼく]の方[ほう]が
SongLyrics.EngStr: If I run towards you, following the impatience in my heart, the truth is, I'm the one who...

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 悪[わる]い意味[いみ]で夏[なつ]の魔法的[まほうてき]なもので 舞[ま]い上[あ]がってましたって
SongLyrics.EngStr: Was carried away in a bad way by the summer magic.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 怖[こわ]すぎるオチばかり浮[う]かんできて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Only scary endings come to mind.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 真夏[まなつ]の空[そら]の下[した]で震[ふる]えながら 君[きみ]の事[こと]を考[かんが]えます
SongLyrics.EngStr: Under the midsummer sky, trembling, I think about you.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 好[す]きなアイスの味[あじ]はきっと
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm sure you have a favorite ice cream flavor.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 会[あ]いたいんだ 今[いま]すぐその角[かど]から 飛[と]び出[だ]してきてくれないか
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to see you. Could you come running from around the corner right now?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 夏[なつ]の魔物[まもの]に連[つ]れ去[さ]られ僕[ぼく]のもとへ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Be taken away by the summer spirits and come to me.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 生[う]まれた星[ほし]のもとが違[ちが]くたって 偶然[ぐうぜん]と夏[なつ]の魔法[まほう]とやらの力[ちから]で 僕[ぼく]のものに
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if we were born under different stars, by coincidence or summer magic, you'll be mine.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: なるわけないか
SongLyrics.EngStr: Or maybe that will never happen.
